name: 328. In the Shadows of Thought
description: My thoughts sometimes linger in the shadows, in the quiet spaces where doubts creep in. Living with a disability means navigating those shadows, trying to find the light in a world that doesn't always see me. But in those shadows, I've learned to find clarity, to face what scares me, and to rise above it.

attributes.value: blue, dark blue, black, white, salmon
